quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes… including you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Sometimes the most productive thing you can do is relax.
author: Mark Black

quote: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.
author: Ovid

quote: Your mind will answer most questions if you learn to relax and wait for the answer.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: A little nonsense now and then is relished by the wisest men.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Relax. Nothing is under control.
author: Adi Da

quote: Doing nothing is sometimes the best thing you can do.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Don't forget to drink water and get some sunlight. You’re basically a houseplant with more complicated emotions.
author: Unknown

quote: Breathe. Let go. And remind yourself that this very moment is the only one you know you have for sure.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Keep calm and take a break.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes a break from your routine is the very thing you need.
author: Unknown
